## SampledTimer.getStats() method

Updates the `min`<!-- -->, `max`<!-- -->, `avg`<!-- -->, and `median` values. Currently, this function is expensive, as it requires a copy of the sampled values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getStats(): Stats | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Stats](./harp-mapview.stats.md) \| undefined
